entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 15 this morning then steady. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this morning. Temperature falling to minus 15 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
